title: Semiconductor Lifecycle Search Engine
description: Device lifecycle manager and API with a search engine integrated
details: This application was developed during my role as a Supply Line Engineer at Teradyne Costa Rica to reduce the time and increase accuracy when consulting the lifecycle information from specific components in the electronic design area. The application offers an API that expose some endpoints to feed a database with the lifecycle information, and a search engine to query that information

title: Bluecpprint
description: CLI utility to create a new C++ project with a predifined structure inspired by Melkeydev's go-blueprint
details: Inspired by Melkeydev, this project aims to make easier the creation of new C/C++ projects, making you to just go straight to the code and not to the project structure. The project is written in Golang and is available in my repo.

description: System to streamline patient management, medical records, and prescriptions across its various locations
details: A medical system for patients and appointments is required, contracted by a fictional hospital, for the creation of the system called SIMEPCI (Medical System for Patients and Appointments). This private entity has multiple locations across the country and is interested in managing the control and follow-up of patients, medical records, and prescriptions in a centralized system.
